about.title: About me
paragraphs: Hello! My name is Gustavo Fernandes, I am a computer scientist and software engineer who recursively aims to learn and continuously evolve.

Although my main experience is in web development, as a good generalist, I'm always eager to learn new things. Whether it's diving into concepts like machine learning and functional programming, or participating in hackathons and competitive programming competitions, studying this field always captivates me.
Therefore, my goal is to combine the science and art of programming to develop software solutions that add value to people's lives. And, of course, have fun in the process.

items.title: Web Development Intern
items.subtitle: Alpha Company — 2017
items.text: Worked on front-end tasks and API integrations.
items.detail: Worked closely with designers to implement responsive UI, improved API integration reliability, and wrote unit tests for key components. Learned best practices for collaborative development.

items.title: Junior Developer
items.subtitle: Beta Company — 2018-2019
items.text: Contributed to fullstack development and service maintenance.
items.detail: Built features across front-end and back-end, participated in code reviews, and helped reduce average response times through performance tuning and database indexing.

items.title: Mid-level Developer
items.subtitle: Gamma Company — 2020-2022
items.text: Technical leadership on key features and performance improvements.
items.detail: Led a small team to deliver high-impact features, introduced CI/CD pipelines, and implemented monitoring which increased system uptime and reduced incident resolution time.

items.title: Software Engineer
items.subtitle: Freelance / Personal Projects — 2023
items.text: Building personal projects, open-source work and consulting.
items.detail: Designed and delivered multiple personal projects, contributed to open-source libraries, and consulted for small teams on architecture and best practices.

items.title: Senior Software Engineer
items.subtitle: Delta Company — 2024-present
items.text: Working on architecture, technical leadership and product evolution.
items.detail: Driving architectural decisions, mentoring engineers, and working closely with product to align technical roadmaps with business goals. Focused on scalability and developer experience.
